price: 130. Eh bino bandimi! Bolia misolo mia ekotama te na bobakisi misolo mia bino, mpe bobanga Allah mpo bokoka kolonga.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَأۡكُلُواْ ٱلرِّبَوٰٓاْ أَضۡعَٰفٗا مُّضَٰعَفَةٗۖ وَٱتَّقُواْ ٱللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُفۡلِحُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takulū al-riba aḍʿāfan muḍāʿafatan wa-ittaqū al-laha laʿallakum tuf'liḥūna
